devices_included: Whiteboard, large vertical display; Tabletop, large horizontal display
use_cases_desc: Control room application, with different map views, but not too specific. Large wall display and tabletop.
contribution_desc:
Framework for multi-modal, multi-display interaction.
Present glueTK, a framework that abstracts from input modalities, allows the design of interfaces for a wide range of display sizes, and makes the distribution across multiple machines more transparent.
Demonstrated with an example application.
crossdevice_def:
use term post-WIMP interfaces.
Otherwise refer to multi-display interaction.
